attributes.action: Exam boards to make all results public on a database
attributes.background: To allow employers to quickly search a candidate's exam results. This will prevent people from lying on their CV and will encourage youths to want to succeed in their exams if they know that future employers will be able to see their exact results. A generic database would be better for all.

rejection.details:
Exam boards are independent of both Government and Parliament. 

You could start a petition asking the Government to make/ require exam boards to publish all results on a public database.
